definition: to fill/to satisfy/to fulfill/to act in place of/substitute/sufficient/full
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Hold the mouth of a balloon filled with air. Let it go suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 捏緊一個充氣的汽球口，然後突然鬆開手。

sentences.english: Opening the door in an emergency will automatically  inflate the evacuation slides.
sentences.chinese: 打開緊急出口的門會自動充氣逃離滑梯。

sentences.english: Wang and his roommates used 10 buckets of water to fill the inflatable pool.
sentences.chinese: 王曉星和室友們用了10桶水才把充氣泳池填滿。

sentences.english: The tanks have to be refilled using special equipment.
sentences.chinese: 氣瓶必須用專用設備再次充氣。

sentences.english: The deep breaths also assist in aerating the form for better health.
sentences.chinese: 深呼吸也幫助爲了更好的健康而向形態充氣。

sentences.english: Bite through a inflated balloon by mouth.
sentences.chinese: 用嘴巴把一個充氣的氣球咬破。

sentences.english: Tom's lifejacket had failed to inflate.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆的救生衣未能充氣。

sentences.english: Cold empress the heap fabric loose type Chong spirit continuous even wash, fabric size stability.
sentences.chinese: 冷堆後織物松式充氣連續平洗，織物尺寸穩定。

sentences.english: Oh, my God, Rach. Beanbag chairs.
The pilot ditched the plane and climbed out on his raft.
sentences.chinese: 飛行員使飛機在水上迫降並爬出飛機乘上充氣救生筏。

sentences.english: In this paper, a kind of advanced Automatic superintending and control system for pressurizing cables is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種先進的充氣電纜氣壓自動監測系統。

sentences.english: When complete, this inflatable will be a nice addition to my fireboat .
sentences.chinese: 完成時，這個充氣式將是一個很好，除了我的滅火輪。

sentences.english: A tyre expanda when you pump air into it.
sentences.chinese: 給輪胎充氣輪胎會鼓起來的。

sentences.english: The balloon swelled out with gas.
The inflator can be conveniently disassembled for air inflation of tyres.
sentences.chinese: 氣筒可方便卸下用於車胎等充氣。
